channel.title: CVE Feed for AMD -- Ryzen™ 5000 Series Desktop Processor with Radeon™ Graphics Formerly codenamed “Cezanne” AM4
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AMD -- Ryzen™ 5000 Series Desktop Processor with Radeon™ Graphics Formerly codenamed “Cezanne” AM4

item.title: CVE-2023-20596|2024-08-02T09:05:36.288Z -- amd -- ryzen%E2%84%A2%205000%20series%20desktop%20processor%20with%20radeon%E2%84%A2%20graphics%20formerly%20codenamed%20%E2%80%9Ccezanne%E2%80%9D%20am4
item.description: Improper input validation in the SMM Supervisor may allow an attacker with a compromised SMI handler to gain Ring0 access potentially leading to arbitrary code execution.
